cloths.name: life jacket
cloths.description: a life jacket from your sunken ship

questInventory.name: The life of a jacket
questInventory.textStart: You need to search for a life jacket!
questInventory.textMid: You did not bring me the life jacket yet!
questInventory.textEnd: Thanks for bringing me the life jacket!

reward.name: backpack
reward.description: a backpack where you can store some additional items

fulfillmentItems.name: life jacket
fulfillmentItems.description: a life jacket from your sunken ship

ways.hint: This is a hint to unblock the way
ways.name: small path
ways.description: In the west you can see a lagoon with some washed up boxes from your sunken ship.

ways.name: sandy way
ways.description: An entrance to a cave near the sea is on the east side of the beach.

ways.name: steep track
ways.description: North of the beach a steep track is leading to a hill.

cloths.name: backpack
cloths.description: a backpack where you can store some additional items

quests.name: The life of a jacket
quests.textStart: You need to search for a life jacket!
quests.textMid: You did not bring me the life jacket yet!
quests.textEnd: Thanks for bringing me the life jacket!

reward.name: backpack
reward.description: a backpack where you can store some additional items

fulfillmentItems.name: life jacket
fulfillmentItems.description: a life jacket from your sunken ship

interactiveObjects.hint: These waves look like they could be ride.
interactiveObjects.name: wave
interactiveObjects.description: There are some great waves in the sea

rooms.name: beach
rooms.description:
You find yourself at an empty beach. If you would not be stranded, this would be a nice place for holiday. 
In the sand is some debris of your sunken ship. You need to find a way to get home again!

ways.name: beach
ways.description: On the west side you can see the beach where this nightmare started.

ways.name: tunnel
ways.description: A winding tunnel leads deeper into the cave, but it's pretty dark in there.

foods.place: lies next to the pirate skeleton
foods.name: rum
foods.description: an old dusty bottle of rum

weapons.place: is in the belt buckle of the pirate skeleton
weapons.name: saber
weapons.description: a rusty saber of the pirate

rooms.name: cave on the beach
rooms.description:
You enter the cave which has been created by the waves crashing against the stone wall. It smells fishy in here. 
At the end of the cave you see something like a skeleton of a pirate.

ways.name: small path
ways.description: A small path leads east from the lagoon.

cloths.name: swimming goggles
cloths.description: swimming googles which seem to be fine

foods.place: lies next to a palm tree
foods.name: coconut

rooms.name: lagoon
rooms.description:
You walk along a long lagoon which protrudes into the sea. All over the place are parts of your sunken ship at the beach. 
It seems you are the only person who was washed up at this huge beach.

ways.name: steep track
ways.description: A steep track leads down in the south.

ways.name: ladder
ways.description: You can climb up a ladder to the treetop. Maybe you can catch a glimpse of the island?

ways.name: hillside
ways.description: In the west a slope leads gently downwards.

ways.name: serpentines
ways.description: A rocky winding mountain path leads down in serpentines.

foods.place: lies in the dirt next to a huge apple tree
foods.name: apple

foods.place: lies in the dirt next to a huge apple tree
foods.name: apple

foods.place: lies in the dirt next to a huge apple tree
foods.name: rotten apple
foods.description: this apple doesn't look that delicious

rooms.name: hill
rooms.description:
You walk through a little forest and end up in front of a little hill. You climb up the hill so you have a better overview and can orientate yourself. 
On top of the hill you can see almost over the entire island. Maybe you can get even a little higher!

ways.name: ladder
ways.description: A ladder leads down from the platform

tools.place: lies between two wood planks on the ground
tools.name: rusty key

rooms.name: viewing platform
rooms.description:
You climb up a ladder which is placed at the apple tree. You reach the top end of the ladder and see a little viewing platform. 
On the viewing platform, you can see over the whole island. It's really huge and you can only guess what is in the distance. 
Maybe some item can help you to get a more detailed look.

ways.name: hillside
ways.description: To the east of the hut is a wide slope.

resources.name: broken bottle
resources.description: a broken wine bottle

rooms.name: rundown hut on the hill
rooms.description: You stand in front of a very old rundown hut on the hill next to the apple tree. There are no windows so you can't see what's in there and the door is locked.

ways.to: Deck of an old stranded ship
ways.name: plank
ways.description: An old plank in the west is connecting the deck of the ship with the cliff.

ways.name: path
ways.description: A southern beaten path leads to a small camp site.

ways.name: stream path
ways.description: East a path is running alongside a stream.

rooms.name: Cliff above the ship graveyard
rooms.description:
You can smell the sea and feel the spray on your face. You are standing on top off a cliff site with reefs in the sea and many shipwrecks in the water. 
And a big old shipwreck connecting the cliff top with the boulder and beach below.

ways.name: path
ways.description: In the north a beaten path leads to a cliff.

foods.name: lunch box
foods.description: a small box that contains some food

rooms.name: Camp site
rooms.description: There is a tent, a small fire place and some trunks. The tent looks like it has been standing there for quite some time but still seems to be in use.

ways.from: Deck of an old stranded ship
ways.name: plank
ways.description: An old plank in the east is connecting the deck of the ship with the cliff.

ways.from: Deck of an old stranded ship
ways.name: trapdoor
ways.description: A trapdoor is blocked by a fallen mast.

cloths.name: sail cloth
cloths.description: a large, torn part of the sail

resources.name: rope
resources.description: part of the rigging is still intact and can be used as a rope

rooms.name: Deck of an old stranded ship
rooms.description:
You have boarded an old three mast sailing ship. Everything is creaking and roting. 
One mast is completely gone, one is still standing with torn, flapping sails and one is broken lying on the deck.

ways.to: Deck of an old stranded ship
ways.name: trapdoor
ways.description: A trapdoor is blocked by a fallen mast.

ways.name: hole
ways.description: On the south side there's a hole in the the ship hull.

resources.name: nautical map
resources.description: an old, nautical map with an island marked on it

resources.name: compass
resources.description: a small, old compass

rooms.name: ship interior
rooms.description:
You are in the ships interior. You smell decaying wood and rotten fish. 
You enter a room that looks like the captains cabin. In the middle of the cabin is a table barely standing on three legs.

ways.name: hole
ways.description: A short climb over the boulder leads to the hole in the ship hull in the north.

ways.name: sea
ways.description: There's a short swim and dive to the sunk ship wreck in the west.

ways.to: Cave with the mortal remains of the first men
ways.name: cave
ways.description: East there's a big cave in the cliff.

tools.name: anchor
tools.description: not to heavy but enough for a small ship

rooms.name: Beach below the cliff
rooms.description:
You are at a small beach enclosed by boulders and the cliff. The sea is clear and you can see the sunken ships through the surface. 
The waves are crashing against the boulders on either side. It seems that there must be a reef before the small beach, since the waves in this area are almost non existent.

ways.name: sea
ways.description: In the east you can emerge from the depth and swim to shore.

tools.name: small treasure box
tools.description: a small treasure box that looks like it might contain something priceless

rooms.name: Sunken ships in the sea
rooms.description:
Close to the surface of the sea are many shipwrecks. There are many different sorts of fish swimming in the ships, which are overgrown with sea life. 
You can see a drop where the sea goes from shallow plunging in the depths. The shipwrecks are within diving range. 
You dive to the closest ship wreak.

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

ways.name: earthworm tunnel
ways.description: A little earthworm tunnel leads down.

ways.name: hole in the ceiling
ways.description: A hole in the ceiling is going up.

rooms.name: giant rabbit hole
rooms.description:
You stand in the middle of a gigantic hole under the earth and feel like 
Alice in Wonderland. On the walls are some roots hanging out and in the 
corner you can discover a soft bed of grass. Maybe you've landed in 
the Easter Bunny's apartment...

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

ways.name: Trapdoor in the ceiling
ways.description: A trapdoor in the ceiling leads back to daylight.

resources.name: sharp sparkling shard of glass
resources.description: a sharp sparkling shard of glass

rooms.name: Hidden cave
rooms.description:
You ended up in some kind of lumber room. Apparently, people used to hide their 
secrets here and store various things. Judging by the destroyed shelves 
and all the broken glass, these treasures have already been stolen.

ways.name: trapdoor under the carpet
ways.description: A trapdoor is hidden under the carpet.

ways.to: cellar of the old house in the forest
ways.name: hole in the wall
ways.description: On the east side of the room, there is a hole in the wall.

resources.name: large beetle with a flattened carapace
resources.description: a large beetle with a flattened carapace

rooms.name: Living room of a torturer
rooms.description:
A large, sparsely furnished living room, which apparently also serves as a bedroom 
and kitchen. There is only a table, covered with crumbs, with a chair and a bed 
of straw. On the floor you will find countless crushed insects in all colours and 
shapes. The shells, legs and antennae of these animals are twisted in unnatural 
positions, which they could not possibly have taken voluntarily.

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

ways.name: stairway
ways.description: A wide gleaming marble staircase leads down.

ways.name: stone way
ways.description: A stone way leads north.

ways.name: wooden staircase
ways.description: A wooden staircase is leading up.

resources.place: is swimming in the centre of the pool
resources.name: small water lily
resources.description: small water lily

rooms.name: Secret Grotto
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of a beautiful room that is bathed in warm colours 
by incident light. In the middle of the room is a warm pool, which with its 
steaming water calls for a relaxing bath. Next to it there are some deck chairs, 
and even a palm tree has found its way here. In the distance you can hear the 
sound of a waterfall and you wonder if this place was created by fairies.

ways.from: Cave with the mortal remains of the first men
ways.name: hole in the floor
ways.description: There is a hole in the floor.  Where will the dark tunnel end?.

ways.from: Cave with the mortal remains of the first men
ways.name: cave
ways.description: In the west you can see a little cave.

resources.name: human skull
resources.description: human skull that feels a little greasy. The shape of the skull is very different from what you are used to from the mirror and reminds you more of a monkey than a human.

rooms.name: Cave with the mortal remains of the first men
rooms.description:
You are in a cave with ochre walls. 
As you remove the dust, you can see something that looks like paintings from the stone age. The paintings 
show different hunting scenes with huge mammoths and sabre-toothed tigers. 
You are struck by the beauty of these old paintings.
From the west you can smell the salty scent of sea water.

ways.name: large brick passageway
ways.description: To the east is a large brick passageway.

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

ways.name: stone staircase
ways.description: A stone staircase leads down.

resources.name: dead bat, neither eaten, stinking or rotting
resources.description: don't even think of eating that uncooked you'll make the whole world stay at home

rooms.name: Crossroads bat
rooms.description:
You're standing at a major underground crossroads, mysteriously 
the floor is quite warm, but never mind. 
When you look up you can understand where the name of this room comes from: The whole cave ceiling is 
covered by bats of different shapes and sizes. It looks like they are sleeping, so shhhh 
- you don't want to wake the bats.

ways.name: stone staircase
ways.description: A stone staircase leads up.

ways.name: way over lava stream
ways.description: way - only use with ladder etc...

rooms.name: Room under crossroads bat I
rooms.description:
You're in a rectangular chamber. It's really hot 
and sweat is dripping from your forehead. It feels like every one of your clothes is just soaked 
with sweat.  If you look to the west you can see the reason: The room is divided in two by a red-hot 
lava flow. The river is bubbling and hissing, and you have to be careful that your clothes don't 
catch fire.

ways.name: heavy door
ways.description: A heavy door on the west side leads to another room.

ways.name: way over lava stream
ways.description: way - only use with ladder etc...

rooms.name: Room under crossroads bat II
rooms.description:
You're in a rectangular chamber. It's really hot 
and sweat is dripping from your forehead. It feels like every one of your clothes is just soaked 
with sweat.  If you look to the east you can see the reason: The room is divided in two by a red-hot 
lava flow. The river is bubbling and hissing, and you have to be careful that your clothes don't 
catch fire.

ways.name: heavy door
ways.description: On the east side is a heavy door. If the door is locked...?

ways.name: a big passage to the second half of the room
ways.description: On the west there is a big passage to the second half of the room.

ways.to: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: a big trapdoor
ways.description: A big trapdoor, too big to miss, leads down.

rooms.name: Butcher's Room II
rooms.description:
You are in an enormous hall divided in two sections. The walls are tiled in red in a strange way and 
there are several drains in the floor. Strange... When you look at the walls, you'll notice 
that there are various sharp tools everywhere, from butchers knives to swords to saws. 
Scratching the walls, you'll notice that the red is not the color of the tiles, but dried 
blood...

ways.name: a big passage
ways.description: On the east there is a big passage to the second half of the room.

ways.name: discrete little hatch
ways.description: A discrete little hatch leads down.

ways.name: small door
ways.description: You see a small door on the north side of the room.

ways.name: locked door
ways.description: A locked door is leading south.

rooms.name: Butcher's Room I
rooms.description:
You are in an enormous hall divided in two sections. The walls are tiled in red in a strange way and 
there are several drains in the floor. Strange... When you look at the walls, you'll notice 
that there are various sharp tools everywhere, from butchers knives to swords to saws. 
Scratching the walls, you'll notice that the red is not the color of the tiles, but dried 
blood...

ways.name: discrete little hatch
ways.description: To get to the top, you can take a discrete little hatch.

rooms.name: hidden dungeon
rooms.description:
You look into a small cell, it's cold and musty. The walls are scratched and covered with 
paintings, it looks like the last inmates in here have lost their minds. There is a small 
hole in the floor, obviously for food, and in the corner there is a bucket for the rubbish.

ways.from: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: a big trapdoor
ways.description: A big trapdoor, too big to miss, is in the ceiling.

ways.from: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: way
ways.description: way

ways.from: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: way
ways.description: way

ways.from: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: way
ways.description: way

rooms.name: cave with nothing but three ways
rooms.description: You are in a cave with nothing but three ways and a trapdoor. There is really nothing in this cave except three ways and a trapdoor.

ways.to: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: way
ways.description: way

resources.name: a giant statue of buddah
resources.description: too heavy to take, shimmering in the light

rooms.name: magical cave
rooms.description:
You're in a round cave. There is total silence. It's so peaceful, everything's even. 
Light from the middle of the ceiling bathes the room in a pleasant light. You imagine 
that you could stay here forever...

ways.to: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: way
ways.description: way

rooms.name: holy grotto
rooms.description:
You're in the middle of a big cave. There are stalactites hanging from the ceiling and 
the floor is littered with stalagmites. You hear the regular dripping of water from 
the top to the bottom. This is accompanied by the quiet omm of an old, wise monk 
in the middle of the cave.

ways.to: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: way
ways.description: way

resources.name: small lump of coal
resources.description: there is nothing special about this lump of coal

resources.name: big lump of coal
resources.description: there is nothing special about this lump of coal

resources.name: lump of coal of medium size
resources.description: there is nothing special about this lump of coal

rooms.name: mineral cave
rooms.description:
You're standing in the middle of a coal mine. A fixed oil lamp illuminates the mining area. The air is stuffy and dusty. 
At the edges you can see different heaps of rocks that have apparently been blasted out of the wall.

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

ways.name: stone staircase
ways.description: A stone staircase is going up.

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

rooms.name: Crossroads ape
rooms.description:
You're standing in the middle of a big crossroads. The walls are just clay and stone, 
covered with a strange pattern and you wonder why the ceiling doesn't fall on your head. 
You question whether it's only you or whether others before you have had the same thought. 
On closer inspection you notice that the patterns on the wall are primitive drawings of 
apes. Despite the age and the dirt, they are still clearly visible on closer inspection, 
impressive...

ways.to: Cave with the mortal remains of the first men
ways.name: hole in the ceiling
ways.description: Through a hole in the ceiling you can go up.

ways.name: large brick passageway
ways.description: A large brick passageway leads west.

rooms.name: archaeological chamber
rooms.description:
You're in a chamber that for some reason has an electric 
light on. It looks like someone's been here recently. There's all kinds of archaeological equipment 
scattered around the room. A cupboard with books containing the history of first men has to be implemented.

ways.name: stone staircase
ways.description: A stone staircase is going down.

ways.name: cupboard
ways.description: On the north side there is a big hole in the wall.

resources.name: iron ingot
resources.description: An iron ingot. Maybe you can create something with it.

resources.name: iron ingot
resources.description: An iron ingot. Maybe you can create something with it.

resources.name: iron ingot
resources.description: An iron ingot. Maybe you can create something with it.

resources.name: iron ingot
resources.description: An iron ingot. Maybe you can create something with it.

rooms.name: Pillaged armory
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of a looted armory. Through the flickering light of 
torches you can dimly see some stands for armour. A few individual pieces of armour 
lie scattered, broken and rusted on the floor. By looking closer you can see that 
nobody has been here for a while, the armor stands and the broken armor pieces are covered 
with a thick layer of dust.

ways.name: small door
ways.description: Southern you can enter the room through a small door.

ways.name: little earthworm tunnel
ways.description: A little earthworm tunnel leads back to daylight.

rooms.name: Earthworm tunnel
rooms.description:
A small tunnel that feels like it was dug by an oversized earthworm. 
In the absence of light, you can feel the wet, damp earth surrounding 
you in far too many places on your body. Thank God you haven't eaten 
much since you arrived at the beach, otherwise you would be stuck down 
here forever. Slowly you feel the walls coming closer and closer to you 
from all sides. Either you are claustrophobic or the walls are actually 
moving, but in both cases it's time to leave the tunnel!

ways.name: ladder
ways.description: A ladder leads to a cave on the beach.

ways.name: a dry way out of this cave
ways.description: In the north you see a dry way out of this cave.

cloths.name: old tattered leather shoe
cloths.description: decomposed by the water and many sweaty feat

foods.place: is lying on the ground of the river, partly covered with mud
foods.name: old ampoule full of fermented wine, mixed with brackish water
foods.description: lying there a few years or for decades, the wine is undrinkable

resources.place: is swimming on the surface of the river
resources.name: large gnawed rotten brown bone of an animal
resources.description: it smells so disusting that you have absolutely no desire to touch it

weapons.place: is lying on the ground of the river
weapons.name: old rusty and bent knife
weapons.description: better suited for poisoning than stabbing

rooms.name: Cave with underground river
rooms.description:
You're standing in a dark cave that smells like rotten fish. Your feet are wet and cold and you feel something muddy. 
It looks like you are standing in the middle of an underground river. But when you take a closer look you notice 
that it consists only of garbage, garbage and sewage. Man, it stinks!

ways.name: stairway
ways.description: A wide gleaming marble staircase leads up.

ways.name: a dry way
ways.description: In the south a dry way leaves the locker room.

resources.place: is lying on the towel stand
resources.name: big towel with a kind of flower pattern in blue and pink
resources.description: big towel with a kind of flower pattern in blue and pink

rooms.name: Locker room
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of a small cave that is apparently used as a 
changing room. The floor is tiled and heated, and on the walls are small cabins for changing.

ways.name: stone way
ways.description: A stone way leads south.

ways.name: locked door
ways.description: In the north you see a locked door.

rooms.name: Killer Sauna
rooms.description:
The room is dark and hardly lit. Suddenly you feel so warm and it's so hard to 
breathe. The air is hot and stuffy, the sweat is running off your forehead. 
You slowly notice how your vision disappears and your eyes turn black. It's 
much too hot in here, even for a sauna. Get out of here!

ways.name: house door
ways.description: A wooden door east is going outside towards the village square.

resources.name: sewing kit
resources.description: A sewing kit that can be used to sew pieces of textile together.

rooms.name: house in the village
rooms.description: You are in a house at the village with some natives in it.

ways.name: door
ways.description: In the west is the wooden door of a house.

ways.name: gate
ways.description: In the east is the gate of the smithy.

ways.name: path
ways.description: A path leads up towards the vulcan in the north.

ways.name: long path
ways.description: A long path going south. On that path are many footsteps which tells you that this path is often used.

foods.place: hanging on a barbecue skewer over the fire
foods.name: grilled pork

interactiveCraftingObjects.usage: It can be used for preparing food.

createables.name: fried fish
createables.description: A good looking and very good smelling fried fish.

createables.name: baked apple
createables.description: A delicious looking baked apple. Smells like these your mom made on christmas every year.

createables.name: fried egg
createables.description: A fried egg, nothing special. But it looks very jummy.

interactiveCraftingObjects.name: stove
interactiveCraftingObjects.description: A stove over the fire, where you can prepare food.

rooms.name: village square
rooms.description: You are on the village square in the middle of the village.

ways.name: gate
ways.description: In the west a gate is going outside towards the village square.

ways.name: ladder
ways.description: A ladder is going down to the cellar of the smithy.

cloths.name: iron helmet
cloths.description: A freshly forged, strong helmet made out of iron.

tools.name: hammer
tools.description: A hammer with an heavy iron head and a wooden handle which can be used for forging.

interactiveCraftingObjects.usage: It can be used for forging things.

createables.name: iron boots
createables.description: Boots made out of iron to protect your feet.

createables.name: iron axe
createables.description: An axe made out of iron.

interactiveCraftingObjects.name: anvil
interactiveCraftingObjects.description: An anvil which can be used for forging things.

interactiveCraftingObjects.place: is standing next to the wall
interactiveCraftingObjects.usage: It can be used for melting ores.

createables.name: iron ingot
createables.description: An iron ingot. Maybe you can create something with it.

interactiveCraftingObjects.name: furnance
interactiveCraftingObjects.description: An furnance which can be used for melting ores.

interactiveCraftingObjects.place: is standing next to the wall
interactiveCraftingObjects.usage: It can be used for melting ores.

createables.name: iron ingot
createables.description: An iron ingot. Maybe you can create something with it.

interactiveCraftingObjects.name: furnance
interactiveCraftingObjects.description: An furnance which can be used for melting ores.

rooms.name: smithy
rooms.description: You are in the smithy of the village with a smith and his assistant in it.

ways.name: ladder
ways.description: A ladder going up to the ground floor of the smithy.

ways.name: cupboard
ways.description: A big cupboard southern standing next to the wall. Could be something special...

resources.place: is lying in a dark corner
resources.name: piece of coal
resources.description: A black and dusty piece of coal.

resources.place: is lying in a dark corner
resources.name: piece of coal
resources.description: A black and dusty piece of coal.

resources.name: piece of coal
resources.description: A black and dusty piece of coal.

resources.place: is lying in a dark corner
resources.name: piece of coal
resources.description: A black and dusty piece of coal.

resources.name: wood stick
resources.description: A wooden stick, nothing special. Maybe you can use it to create something.

resources.name: wood stick
resources.description: A wooden stick, nothing special. Maybe you can use it to create something.

resources.name: iron ore
resources.description: A piece of stone with some iron in it. Maybe you can get the iron out of there by melting it.

resources.name: iron ore
resources.description: A piece of stone with some iron in it. Maybe you can get the iron out of there by melting it.

resources.name: iron ore
resources.description: A piece of stone with some iron in it. Maybe you can get the iron out of there by melting it.

resources.name: iron ore
resources.description: A piece of stone with some iron in it. Maybe you can get the iron out of there by melting it.

rooms.name: cellar of the smithy
rooms.description: You are in cellar of the smithy.

ways.name: path to the village
ways.description: A path is going downwards to the village in the south.

ways.name: path to the vulcan
ways.description: A narrow and very steep path going upwards to the vulcan in the west. If you go up here, it can get very hot.

resources.name: altar cloth
resources.description: A white, large piece of textile used to decorate the altar.

resources.name: potion
resources.description: A little glass bottle with a purple liquid in it. Could be a potion with a magic effect.

rooms.name: sacrificial altar
rooms.description: You are standing in front of an sacrificial altar where people can make a sacrifice for the forgiveness of their sins.

ways.name: path
ways.description: In the east a narrow and very steep path going down to the sacrificial altar. If you go down this path, it will get cooler.

rooms.name: vulcan
rooms.description: You are standing on a vulcan. In front of you there is the crater with the seething lava in it.

ways.name: path
ways.description: In the west a path is leading inside the forest. The noises are getting louder and louder!

ways.name: path outside the forest
ways.description: A path leading outside the forest in the east.

resources.name: liana
resources.description: A liana hanging from a tree. It seems to be as strong as a rope.

resources.name: pile of leaves
resources.description: A pile of leaves with something under it.

rooms.name: beginning of the forest
rooms.description:
You find yourself at the beginning of a forest. 
There are different noises coming from the inside. They do not sound friendly. 
There is a sign leading inside the forest.

ways.name: ladder
ways.description: A broken ladder to the tree house. There is a step lying on the ground but the nails are missing.

ways.name: path
ways.description: In the east a path leads back to the beginning of the forest. The noises are getting more and more quiet and you feel relieved.

ways.name: bridge made of a cut tree
ways.description: In the north you could try to balance above the tree which was cut to get over the powering river.

resources.name: step from the tree house
resources.description: A step from the tree house which could be used to get up.

resources.name: rusty curved nails
resources.description: Some rusty curved nails which can not be used anymore.

rooms.name: forest path
rooms.description:
A path with trees and a small tree house. 
It does not look too stable but should be barely enough to lift yourself. 
To the north is a powering river with a tiger in front of it!

ways.name: ladder
ways.description: You could take the ladder down the tree house. You should climb very slowly to make sure you don't fall down.

ways.name: liana
ways.description: There is a liana northern. You should hold yourself very tight on the liana to swing above the powering river.

cloths.name: pair of shoes
cloths.description: A pair of shoes looking like the owner forgot them. They got the initials G. E. written inside.

foods.place: is lying on a small table
foods.name: empty water bottle
foods.description: An empty water bottle which is very robust.

foods.name: rotten apple
foods.description: A rotten apple with a worm looking out.

rooms.name: tree house
rooms.description:
You find yourself inside the tree house which is pretty high above the ground. 
You decide to better not look down. The wood is creaking under you!

ways.to: in front of the old house
ways.name: path
ways.description: In the west a way is leading to an old house in the forest.

ways.name: path
ways.description: On the north side there is a way to a ruin which you can see in the distance.

ways.name: a long path
ways.description: In the east appears a long path. On that path are many footsteps which tells you that this path is often used.

ways.name: bridge made of a cut tree
ways.description: In the south you could try to balance above the tree which was cut to get over the powering river to get to the side with the tree house.

foods.place: is hanging on a fishing rod
foods.name: fish

resources.name: broken fishing rod
resources.description: A broken fishing rod which can no longer be used.

resources.place: is lying next to the river
resources.name: broken vase
resources.description: A broken vase which was used to transport water.

rooms.name: forest path with four directions
rooms.description: You reached a forest fork which leads to four directions.

ways.from: in front of the old house
ways.name: door
ways.description: You could get inside the old house by using the leaning door on the west side of the house.

ways.from: in front of the old house
ways.name: path
ways.description: In the east a path leads away from the house.

resources.place: is lying next to the old house
resources.name: pile of wood
resources.description: A pile of wood

resources.place: is lying next to a tree.
resources.name: abandoned beehive
resources.description: A beehive without honey or bees.

rooms.name: in front of the old house
rooms.description:
You are in front of the old house. You can see some footsteps leading inside. 
There could be a person inside the house which you can't see because of the barricaded windows. You should better watch out.

ways.to: cellar of the old house in the forest
ways.name: ladder
ways.description: You can climb a ladder down into the cellar.

ways.to: in front of the old house
ways.name: door
ways.description: In the east you can leave the house through a wooden door.

foods.place: is lying on a old wooden table
foods.name: bread

resources.place: is lying on a old wooden table
resources.name: old diary
resources.description: A diary from someone.

resources.place: is lying on a old wooden table
resources.name: bag of gold
resources.description: A small bag full of gold.

tools.name: bedsheet
tools.description: A bedsheet which could be useful.

weapons.name: axe
weapons.description: A sharp axe which could cut a tree.

rooms.defaultItemLocation: is lying on a old wooden table
rooms.name: old house in the forest
rooms.description: It seems like a small house. You hear someone screaming for help from the cellar!!

ways.from: cellar of the old house in the forest
ways.name: ladder
ways.description: You could take the ladder to get out of the cellar.

ways.from: cellar of the old house in the forest
ways.name: hole
ways.description: In the west a hole is leading to the living room of a torturer.

cloths.name: diving mask
cloths.description: A mask which helps to dive.

resources.name: wood
resources.description: Some wood.

resources.place: is lying next to the wood
resources.name: chest
resources.description: A chest with something in it.

rooms.name: cellar of the old house in the forest
rooms.description: A cellar with a torture chamber and a pile of wood. You see a person tied to a rack. He seems very scared!

ways.name: archway
ways.description: An archway leading west into the building.

ways.name: path
ways.description: A long path leading south to a forest.

ways.name: path
ways.description: A path leading east to a court with scattered debris.

rooms.name: ruins entry
rooms.description: It is a delerict building. It was abandoned ages ago.

ways.name: path
ways.description: A path leading back to the building in the west.

ways.name: path
ways.description: In the north you can recognize a path from the deciphered inscription.

rooms.name: ruins riddle
rooms.description: You see some scattered fragments of the building. Some of them have inscriptions.

ways.name: path
ways.description: The path in the south is leading back to the scattered debris.

cloths.name: decorated iron chestplate
cloths.description: The chestplate is decorated with valuable gems.

resources.name: stack of torches
resources.description: A couple of torches.

rooms.name: ruins treasure
rooms.description: The place indicated by the deciphered inscription.

ways.name: archway
ways.description: Ther northern archway is leading outside.

ways.name: archway
ways.description: An archway leading back in the east.

ways.name: bricks
ways.description: Multiple bricks protrude from the wall, enabling a bold climb to the top of the ruin.

weapons.name: rusty iron sword
weapons.description: The sword looks a bit fragile, but should last a couple of hits.

rooms.name: ruins basement
rooms.description: It was once an impressing building, but after centuries, there isn't much left.

ways.name: descent
ways.description: A dangerous descent leads down to the basement.

rooms.name: ruins top
rooms.description: Up from here, you can see far.

ways.name: archway
ways.description: In the south an archway is leading into the building.

ways.name: hole in the middle of a meadow
ways.description: A hole in the middle of a meadow is leading down.

rooms.name: ruins outside
rooms.description: Outside of the building.

ways.name: serpentines
ways.description: A rocky winding mountain path leads east.

ways.name: grass path
ways.description: You can see a chapel at the west edge of the meadow.

ways.name: narrow passage
ways.description: On the north side there seams to be a small gap between some bushes.

resources.name: grass
resources.description: The grass has grown very high so that you cannot see the ground.

resources.name: flowers
resources.description: The weadow is full of beautiful flowers in all colors.

resources.name: mumble
resources.description: mumbles lost by a little child a long time ago

rooms.name: flower meadow
rooms.description: A large meadow with cute squirrels and chirping birds.

ways.name: grass path
ways.description: At the east side of the chapel, there is a beautiful meadow.

resources.name: potted plant
resources.description: a dried up potted plant decorates the altar

resources.name: bible
resources.description: an old dusty bible

rooms.name: chapel
rooms.description: It is completely quiet in the chapel. You hardly dare to breathe.

ways.name: narrow passage
ways.description: On the south side there seams to be a small gap between some bushes.

ways.name: paved way
ways.description: A wide street leads over cobblestones to the north.

ways.name: path towards the forest
ways.description: A path leads into the forest in the west.

ways.name: climbing tree
ways.description: Maybe you can reach the low hanging branches of the maple tree...

rooms.name: maple tree
rooms.description: An ancient maple tree with huge branches and bushes all around.

ways.name: jump
ways.description: With a skillfull jump you can reach the ground.

ways.name: climbing
ways.description: Above you there are lots of branches.

rooms.name: low branches of maple tree
rooms.description: Branches are all around you

ways.name: climbing
ways.description: You should be careful while climbing down.

rooms.name: top of maple tree
rooms.description: You're on top of the maple tree. You can see the sun above you.

ways.name: paved way
ways.description: A wide street leads south over cobblestones.

ways.name: mud path
ways.description: The path leading east looks muddy and wet.

ways.name: wooden door
ways.description: On the north side you see a wooden door. Whether the door is open...?

rooms.name: front of the mill
rooms.description: You stand in front of an old mill.

ways.name: wooden door
ways.description: The wooden door on the south side looks rotten.

resources.name: sacks of flour
resources.description: Sacks of flour are leaning against the wall.

tools.name: ladder
tools.description: A long ladder is standing in the corner.

ways.name: mud path
ways.description: The path leading west looks muddy and wet.

ways.name: stream path
ways.description: In the north a path runs alongside a stream.

ways.name: into the pond
ways.description: The southern bank in front of you is very flat.

rooms.name: shore of the pond
rooms.description: An idyllic pond with water lilies on it.

ways.name: swim towards shore
ways.description: The northern shore seams to be a lot saver.

ways.name: swim towards waterfall
ways.description: the waterfall in the south looks dangerous. Sure you want to risk your life?

ways.name: diving
ways.description: Maybe you can dive to the ground.

rooms.name: pond
rooms.description: You're in the middle of the pond. You can see a waterfall splashing into the water.

ways.name: diving
ways.description: Above you the sun is shining.

cloths.name: sunglasses
cloths.description: colorful sunglasses lost by a vacationer

resources.name: sacks of flour
resources.description: Sacks of flour are leaning against the wall.

tools.name: anchor
tools.description: A heavy-looking anchor is almost completely covered by sand.

rooms.name: bottom of the pond
rooms.description: There's water all around you. You can't see anything.

ways.name: swim towards the pond
ways.description: The water over there in the north looks calmer.

ways.name: through the waterfall
ways.description: Directly in front of you the southern waterfall is splashing into the pond.

rooms.name: waterfall
rooms.description: The water foams and creates little waves.

ways.name: through the waterfall
ways.description: Directly in front of you the waterfall is splashing into the pond. Maybe you should swim back north.

ways.name: wooden staircase
ways.description: A wooden staircase is leading down.

rooms.name: hidden cave
rooms.description:
The spray of the waterfall splashes directly into your face, you stand directly behind the waterfall. 
It is soothing to listen to the even splashing of the waterfall and feel its energy.
